attributes.action: For the UK to vote on becoming an Atheist nation.
attributes.additional_details: For the Government to hold referendums in Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and England on whether the people of these collective countries (Great Britain) wish to be collectively known as having Christian faith. With the vast decline in Christianity and increase in Atheism, it is time to ask how the British people really want to be known as and to bring to the front 21st century views and beliefs that urgently require addressing so that we can all live in a modern peaceful society where religion cannot be used for triumph or disdain.
